allSaves.value: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

details.flavorText: These skull-headed, vulture-winged daemons are harbingers of pestilence and servants of their patron Horseman, Apollyon. Manifestations of evil souls who perished from disease in life, leukodaemons work tirelessly to spread disease across all the worlds of the multiverse. More than any other daemon, leukodaemons cooperate with each other and those who conjure them to mortal worlds to spread sickness and plague, eschewing personal glory for end results.

description.value:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you succeed against a spell effect, you counteract it. If you succeed against a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

target.value: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item

description.value: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you succeed against a spell effect, you counteract it. If you succeed against a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

target.value: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item

description.value:
Your eyes glow as you sense aligned auras. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. You detect auras of that alignment. You receive no information beyond presence or absence. You can choose not to detect creatures or effects you're aware have that alignment.

Only creatures of 6th level or higher-unless divine spellcasters, undead, or beings from the Outer Sphere-have alignment auras.

Heightened You learn each aura's location and strength.
A leukodaemon senses any creature with a disease, and it knows the type and current stage of all diseases carried by any creature within range.

30 feet. Leukodaemons radiate infection. All creatures within 30 feet of a leukodaemon take a -2 status penalty to saves against disease effects. If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

The leukodaemon exhales a cloud of corpse-bloated, biting black flies in a 20-foot cone. Creatures within the cone take [[/r 4d8 # piercing damage]] piercing damage (basic Reflex save). A creature that fails the save becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened} 1 (or sickened 2 on a critical failure).

The leukodaemon can telepathically communicate with the afflicted creature at any distance on the same plane; Saving Throw Fortitude; Stage 1 carrier (1 day); Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained} 1 (1 day); Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained} 2 (1 day); Stage 4 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained} 2 (1 day); Stage 5 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained} 3 (1 week); Stage 6 dead

The leukodaemon coaxes a disease into full bloom. It chooses a target in its aura of pestilence that's currently affected by a disease. That creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the disease as if the interval for the disease's current stage had passed.
